msItem.title: Āśaucakāṇḍa śrāddhakāṇḍa
msItem.author: Vaidyanātha Dikṣita
msItem.incipit:
1v1 tatra śaṃkhaḥ . dhyānaṃ pratigrahye homasvādhyāyapitṛtarpaṇaṃ karma ca . pretakarma kriyāvarjjamāśaucevinivartayediti . aśaucaśabdārthasmṛtiyandī (gap due to faint ink approximately 8 syllables.) niyamaṃ
1v 2 prāya(ścityā?)dikarmmasvayogyatāpadakaṃ . pāpaviśeṣātmakaṃ vā tadāśocaśabdo na boddhyata iti . atha bhaṭṭācāryai? pāpakṣayo hi śuddhīkarmayogakamevaveti śuddhīpadārthaṃ ?vamabhistadviparitadhyajānamaraṇaṃ.
3v 13 sadyaśśaucaṃ samākhyātaṃ kāntāśapadīsaṃyati .sagṛhevikarṇadevo sa (illegible 1 syllable) drā (illegible 1 syllable) dānahomatapotvare prārabdhe tat prabhutā naraṃ sadya (illegible 2 syllables) (gap due to faint ink and darkened folio approximately 13 syllables.)
msItem.explicit:
200r 7 dayaḥ . ādeśāḥ idamantādikamamuṣmai bhavakṛtyaivamādinirddeśāḥ . puṣmamasāntaraṃ vilaṃba(illegible 1 syllable) samāgamo brahmaprāptiḥ paramaṃ (illegible 2 syllables) proktamityarthaḥ sā
200r 8 ritaḥ . kālegataṃ pātrevidhinā pratipāditaṃ . prāptotyanena tathā dattaṃ janturdītropatiṣṭhitaḥ yanteja (tāpayet ?) piṇḍaṃ ta(stha?)yet brahmaśāśvatamiti .
msItem.finalRubric: 200r 9 ….. iti vaidyanāthadīkṣitaviracite smṛtimuktāphale śrāddhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ śivāya namaḥ hariḥ oṃ
